Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Baker's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point during the outbreak, Baker joined a community in Ohio. Baker is seen in the Commonwealth station. He is assigned with Lim to Sector B by Colonel Vickers . Baker is among the soldiers protecting the Estates as the Commonwealth is overrun by the herd . When the Coalition and Mercer 's loyal troops arrive, they enter into a standoff with Baker and the rest of his squad. However, he eventually lowers his weapon on Vickers ' orders. [1]
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Baker has killed: Numerous counts of zombies
Appearances[]: " The Rotten Core " (No Lines) " Family " (No Lines) " Rest in Peace " (No Lines)
Trivia[]: The actor that portrays this character, Terrance James, portrays a second Commonwealth Soldier called Zell as well as an unnamed Reaper .
